articles.author: Erica Nardozzi
articles.title: My IBS turned out to be colorectal cancer - here are the symptoms I ignored - Daily Mail
articles.description: Bri Mahon, from Newport Beach, California, went viral on TikTok after detailing the colon cancer symptoms that led to her diagnosis.
articles.content:
A 31-year-old mother has opened up about how she was diagnosed with stage 3 colorectal cancer after initially chalking up her symptoms to irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) and stress.

articles.title: SRAM extends 12-speed electronic shifting to its fourth tier Apex groupset - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Also a mechanical 12-speed option and Apex Eagle wide range 12-speed electronic and mechanical groupsets
articles.content:
Not content with three 12-speed electronic drivetrain options, SRAM has launched Apex AXS, sitting below its Red AXS, Force AXS and Rival AXS groupsets.
